headline: Pennsylvania high court picks new map of US House districts
author: Associated Press
sentences:
By MARC LEVY and MARK SCOLFORO
HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — Pennsylvania’s highest court broke a partisan deadlock Wednesday over a new map of congressional districts by selecting boundaries that broadly adhere to the outlines of current districts, even as the state loses one seat because of sluggish population growth.
